title: How does herd immunity work?

multiple-choice.question: What is the concept of herd immunity?

options.label: A
options.text: The idea that a certain percentage of the population needs to be immune to a disease to prevent its spread.

options.label: B
options.text: The idea that a disease is spread through contact with an infected person.

options.label: C
options.text: The idea that a disease is caused by a virus.

options.label: D
options.text: The idea that a disease is spread through contaminated food and water.

multiple-choice.question: What is the purpose of vaccines?

options.label: B
options.text: To prevent the spread of diseases.

multiple-choice.question: What is the herd immunity threshold for measles?
What is the purpose of behavior, such as wearing masks and social distancing, in preventing the spread of diseases?

options.label: B
options.text: To prevent the spread of diseases.

multiple-choice.question: What is the potential of vaccines to protect more than one person?
What is the importance of staying vigilant in preventing the spread of diseases?

options.label: B
options.text: To prevent the spread of diseases.

multiple-choice.question: What is the role of behavior in preventing the spread of diseases?

options.label: B
options.text: To prevent the spread of diseases.

multiple-choice.question: What is the importance of making sure different communities and parts of the world have access to vaccines?

options.label: B
options.text: To prevent the spread of diseases.

multiple-choice.question: What is the potential of vaccines to prevent outbreaks and eradicate diseases?
What is the importance of understanding why vaccines are important?

options.label: B
options.text: To prevent the spread of diseases.

title: How to process your emotions

multiple-choice.question: What is the main idea of the video?

options.label: A
options.text: The importance of physical exercise for mental health

options.label: B
options.text: The impact of unprocessed emotions on mental health

options.label: C
options.text: The benefits of meditation for anxiety

options.label: D
options.text: The role of therapy in treating depression

multiple-choice.question: What is the reason why people may avoid processing their emotions?
What is the outcome of processing emotions?
What is required for effective emotional processing?

options.label: C
options.text: A supportive environment and good friends

multiple-choice.question: What is the purpose of mourning in the process of emotional processing?

options.label: B
options.text: To acknowledge the harsh realities of life

multiple-choice.question: What is the role of society's expectations in emotional processing?

options.label: C
options.text: To make it difficult for people to process their emotions

options.label: D
options.text: To have no impact on emotional processing

multiple-choice.question: What is the consequence of not processing emotions?

options.label: D
options.text: Growth of unoriginal thoughts and depression

multiple-choice.question: What is the result of ignoring our emotions?
What is required for emotional processing to be effective?

options.label: A
options.text: A supportive environment and good friends

multiple-choice.question: What is the outcome of acknowledging our emotions?
